author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Organovo Division Samsara Sciences Announces Multi-Year Supply Agreement
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Organovo Holdings Inc:
* ORGANOVO DIVISION SAMSARA SCIENCES ANNOUNCES MULTI-YEAR SUPPLY AGREEMENT WITH LONZA BIOSCIENCE SOLUTIONS
* ORGANOVO HOLDINGS INC - ‍LONZA WILL MARKET HUMAN CELL PRODUCTS FROM SAMSARA FOR FURTHER DISTRIBUTION TO ITS CUSTOMERS​
* ORGANOVO HOLDINGS INC - CO’S ‍UNIT, SAMSARA SCIENCES ENTERED NON-EXCLUSIVE SUPPLY AGREEMENT WITH LONZA BIOSCIENCE SOLUTIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
